snippet.title: (x68000) King's Dungeon full playthrough
snippet.description:
Full playthrough video of the x68000 game, King's Dungeon (キングスダンジョン). The game was released in December 1992 by Soft Plan. They released at least 38 games for x68000, PC-98, and PC-88 between 1986 and 1996.

In King's Dungeon, you play as a Dark Lord who defends his castle against invading heroes. You summon minions and traps to attempt to defeat the heroes. Each hero slaying grants you experience, which helps unlock new things to summon. There is a total of 40 levels.

King's Dungeon page on LaunchBox: https://gamesdb.launchbox-app.com/games/details/138199
Soft Plan page on LaunchBox: https://gamesdb.launchbox-app.com/developers/games/29559
